sentences: Eks ma ikka tule, kui vähegi võimalik.
Kas sa tuled ka? Eks jah!
context: The word 'ajan' is the first-person singular present indicative form of the Estonian verb 'ajama', which means 'to drive'. In this context, it translates to 'I drive' or 'I am going' in English. The dictionary definition shows that it's a verb form used when referring to oneself performing the action of driving.
